histogram.name: Image.ResampleMS
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Time it takes to do high-quality image resampling for images that are resized. Non-resized images and ones our heuristic decides can be done "badly" are not counted.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.CacheHit
histogram.summary: For each image processed by the image annotation service, records whether or not results for the image already existed in the client-side cache. A hit means that image data was not transmitted to the image annotation server.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ClientResult
histogram.summary: For each request made by a client feature to the image annotation service, reports the final status of the service response.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.Confidence
histogram.summary: For each annotation of the given type returned by the image annotation server, records the confidence (as a percentage) produced by the ML model for the annotation.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.DescType
histogram.summary: For each annotation backend run by the image annotation server, records the gRPC status reported.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.Empty
histogram.summary: For each annotation of the given type returned by the image annotation server, records whether or not the text of the annotation was empty. This is sometimes valid, e.g. for text extraction (OCR) on an image that does not contain any text.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.EncodedJpegSizeKB
histogram.summary: For each image sent from a client feature to the image annotation service, reports the image's final size (in kilobytes) after resizing and reencoding.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.EngineKnown
histogram.summary: For each annotation backend run by the image annotation server, records whether or not the backend is recognised by this version of Chrome.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ImageRequestIncludesDesc
histogram.summary:
For each image request sent to the image annotation server, records whether or not the description backend is included among the requested backends.
The description backend will not be included when the image is known to violate the description model policy (i.e. be too small or have too-high an aspect ratio).

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.JsonParseSuccess
histogram.summary: For each non-empty response sent from the image annotation server, records whether or not JSON data were successfully parsed from the response body.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.PixelFetchSuccess
histogram.summary: For each pixel fetch request sent from the image annotation service to a client feature, records whether or not encoded pixel data were successfully returned to the service.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ServerHttpResponseCode
histogram.summary: For each HTTP response from the image annotation server, reports the associated HTTP code.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ServerLatencyMs
histogram.summary: For each HTTP response from the image annotation server, reports the time elapsed (in milliseconds) since the corresponding request was sent.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ServerNetError
histogram.summary: For each HTTP request sent to the image annotation server, reports the net error (or OK status) of the request.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ServerRequestSizeKB
histogram.summary: For each HTTP request sent to the image annotation server, reports the size of the request. Measured in kilobytes, since a request can contain the pixel data of multiple images.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.ServerResponseSizeBytes
histogram.summary: For each HTTP response from the image annotation server, reports the response size in bytes.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.SourcePixelCount
histogram.summary: For each image sent from a client feature to the image annotation service, reports the image's original (i.e. pre-scaling) area in pixels. Images with pixel count above a certain threshold will be resized prior to transmission.

histogram.name: ImageAnnotationService.AccessibilityV1.Status
histogram.summary: For each annotation backend run by the image annotation server, records the gRPC status reported.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.CacheMetadataCount
histogram.summary: The total number of metadata entries in the image fetcher cache metadata database for a given cache strategy. Recorded during cache eviction process.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.CacheSize
histogram.summary: The total size of the cache for a given cache strategy. Recorded during cache eviction process.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.Events
histogram.summary: Events that track the lifecycle and performance of the cached_image_fetcher. The events reported include: success/failure conditions, various recoverable errors and a couple of dead-end errors.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.ImageLoadFromCacheTime
histogram.summary: The time it takes for cached_image_fetcher to load an image from the cache in native.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.ImageLoadFromCacheTimeJava
histogram.summary: The time it takes for cached_image_fetcher to load an image from the cache in Java.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.ImageLoadFromNativeTimeJava
histogram.summary: The time it takes for cached_image_fetcher to load an image from native code. Only recorded on successful loads.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.ImageLoadFromNetworkAfterCacheHit
histogram.summary: The time it takes for cached_image_fetcher to load an image from the network after a cache hit.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.ImageLoadFromNetworkTime
histogram.summary: The time it takes for cached_image_fetcher to load an image from the network.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.LoadImageMetadata
histogram.summary: The time it takes to load an image's metadata from the metadata store.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.RequestStatusCode
histogram.summary: Android: The integer status code of network requests made by the image data fetcher. This code includes both protocol(1xx-5xx) and non-protocol(-xxx) errors. Recorded when a request completes.

histogram.name: ImageFetcher.TimeSinceLastCacheLRUEviction
histogram.summary: The time since the last LRU eviction from the image cache. Recorded when two LRU evictions occur within closure proximity to one another. Will be used to determine if LRU eviction is happening too frequently.

histogram.name: ImageLoader.Client.Cache.HitMiss
histogram.summary: For each image load request that requested caching, records whether or not it was found in the client-side cache. A hit means the request was not forwarded to the ImageLoader extension.

histogram.name: ImageLoader.Client.Cache.Usage
histogram.summary: Returns the percentage of the client-side cache that is used for loading images, before they are sent to the ImageLoader extension. Expressed as a percentage of ImageLoaderClient.CACHE_MEMORY_LIMIT (e.g. 20MB).

histogram.name: ImageLoader.Client.Cached
histogram.summary: For each image load request records whether or not it requested caching.
